title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" popup action is enabled even when a build is already done.
OB: The "Build" popup action is enabled regardless of whether a build is already done or not.
EB: The "Build" popup action should only be enabled if a build is required, and should be disabled if a build is already done.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Check if a build is already done.
3. If a build is already done, verify that the "Build" popup action is disabled.
4. If a build is not already done, verify that the "Build" popup action is enabled.
